The developer's explanation indicates that the configuration only determines the quality of the image output based on a specified value or a default value. Additionally, the configuration is triggered only when the writeImage method is called, and the frequency of triggering depends on the usage of this method in the system. Overall, the 'QUALITY' configuration is more focused on image quality and size rather than performance optimization.
